name: Facer
tagline: A face detection based on OpenCV
body:
### Face Recognition Project
The purpose is to come up with a better Face Recognition algorithm


### Already accomplished.
1. How to detect face from the photo by using the cascaded face detector.
2. How to improve the face detection rate(Rotate the photo, used adaptive equalizer)
3. Use fisher face algorithm to extract the feature from the image. 

### Next Mile stone
1. Come up with following command tools:
 a. Face extractor can extract the face from the photo.
  Following is the command line command.
    
    extractor -i input.jpg -o /output_folder/result.jpg
   Returned text will have
   Why not use the definition of the face plus directly, seems like the right thing to do. 

```javascript
  [{
    rotate:0,//degree
     x:0.4,
     y:0.1,
     width:0.02,
     height:0.04
}, {
     rotate:20,//degree
     x:0.4,
     y:0.1,
     width:0.02,
     height:0.04
}]
```
Will tell at which rotate angle this face get detected. 

    train -i source.csv -o train.dat

will train the current data,  the output file will keep the trained data. 

    search -i trained.dat -s head.jpg

Will search the result against the head.jpg files. 
What's assumption we make for the head.jpg?
It is already a extracted head file and normalized.
